# **Energieförderprogramm im Kanton Thurgau: Umgesetzte Projekte im Kanton Thurgau**

[Link to dataset on data.tg.ch](https://data.tg.ch/explore/dataset/div-energie-1/information/)

## Description

<p>Die Datensätze beinhalten die Anzahl der im Rahmen des Energieförderprogramms umgesetzten Projekte im Kanton Thurgau ab dem Jahr 2008 nach Förderbereich. </p><p></p><p>Datenquelle: Kompetenzzentrum für Energie Kanton Thurgau</p>

## Load Packages

Every dataset (csv and geodata) on [data.tg.ch](https://data.tg.ch/pages/start/) can be retrieved with the **tgAPI** package. You can download it via [GitHub](https://github.com/ogdtg/tgAPI). Please note that the package has some dependencies, which can result in a lengthy installation process. Therefore, we do not recommend installing the package directly in Google Colab. However, if you intend to run this code on your local machine, we strongly recommend installing the tgAPI package.

```{r}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
# library(remotes)
# remotes::install.github("ogdtg/tgAPI")

```


## Download Data


```{r}
# Download the Dataset via API
res <- httr::GET("https://data.tg.ch/api/explore/v2.0/catalog/datasets/div-energie-1/exports/json")
data <- res$content %>%
  rawToChar() %>%
  jsonlite::fromJSON()

# Use tgAPI
# data <- tgAPI::get_dataset("div-energie-1")

head(data)

```
